pageContext.claim: “Think of it: human trafficking. They kidnap people, they steal people, and they sell people. And because of the Internet, one of the bad things that happens with the Internet -- one of the many bad things -- but because of the Internet, it's the highest it's ever been in history. And this is a world problem. ... But the southern border is a very, very high -- highly used placed by people that do human trafficking.”
pageContext.analysis: Without minimizing the human trafficking problem, proportionally speaking, it's hard to top thousands of years of slavery worldwide.
